meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joanne Seran John Zanier Sandra Gore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #755.

td.p: Joanne Seran, a teacher from North Hollywood, California
John Zanier, an administrative manager from Los Angeles, California
Sandra Gore, a researcher originally from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 3-day cash winnings total $38,302)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "H"
IOWA
THE ROYAL FAMILY
BOTTOMS UP
BILLIARDS
FINAL RESTING PLACES

Joanne
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Alex: You got it. Nice going, we\'ve got less than a minute to go in this round, so make another selection, please.)

The Music Man

John
')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '1957 musical written by an Iowan from which the following comes:

"Oh, there\'s nothing halfway /
About the Iowa way to treat you /
When we treat you /
Which we may not do at all /
There\'s an Iowa kind of special /
Chip-on-the-shoulder attitude /
We\'ve never been without /
That we recall /
We can be cold /
As our falling..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
1957 musical written by an Iowan from which the following comes:
"Oh, there's nothing halfway /
About the Iowa way to treat you /
When we treat you /
Which we may not do at all /
There's an Iowa kind of special /
Chip-on-the-shoulder attitude /
We've never been without /
That we recall /
We can be cold /
As our falling..."
